title: On the construction of local fields in the bulk of AdS_5 and other spaces
abstract: In the Poincare patch of Minkovski AdS_5 we explicitly construct local bulk fields from the boundary operators, to leading order in 1/N. We also construct the Green's function implicitly defined by this procedure. We generalize the construction of local fields for near horizon geometries of Dp branes. We try to expand the procedure to the interacting case, with partial success.
